snippet: A government statement suggests that the man who tried to kill intelligence director Asadullah Khalid might have eluded detection because searching the genital area violated Shariah law.
abstract: Afghan officials say man who tried to kill intelligence chief Asadullah Khalid might have eluded detection because he hid bomb in his groin and searching genital area violates Shariah law.
lead_paragraph: A government statement suggests that the man who tried to kill intelligence director Asadullah Khalid might have eluded detection because searching the genital area violated Shariah law.
